companies.name: Apple
companies.description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California

companies.name: Google
companies.description: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company focusing on online advertising, search engine technology, cloud computing and computer software

companies.name: Microsoft
companies.description: leading developer of personal-computer software systems and applications. The company also publishes books and multimedia titles, produces its own line of hybrid tablet computers, offers e-mail services, and sells electronic game systems and computer peripherals (input/output devices)

companies.name: Amazon
companies.description: It is an American multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, online advertising, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence. It has been referred to as one of the most influential economic and cultural forces in the world and is one of the world's most valuable brands.[6] It is one of the Big Five American information technology companies, alongside Alphabet (Google), Apple, Meta (Facebook), and Microsoft.

companies.name: International Business Machines
companies.description: IBM is one of the world's largest IT companies, with operations in over 170 countries. IBM is known for its hardware and software products, including computers, servers, storage systems and networking equipment.

companies.name: Oracle Corporation
companies.description: Oracle Corporation is an American multinational computer technology corporation headquartered in Austin, Texas. In 2020, Oracle was the third-largest software company in the world by revenue and market capitalization
